violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.
Ensure all persons have required badges.

violations.description: Unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages nearby.
violations.recommendation: Inspect unattended items and ensure they are not suspicious.

violations.description: Persons exhibiting fighting, running, or aggressive gestures nearby.
violations.recommendation: Intervene and ensure the persons are not aggressive.

violations.description: Some persons in work zones do not wear required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons in work zones wear required PPE.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant with several security rules. Persons are present without badges and there are unattended suspicious objects nearby. The risk score indicates a high level of risk to the safety of the area.
